content.description: This route ascends a low angle slab with many moss-filled cracks up the middle of the 5th flatiron.P1. Climb the initial slab from your choice of cracks. Easiest right but also blockiest/looser. Once you reach a large ledge, build a belay w/ gear (60ft)P2. Step right off the belay and climb a small mossy chimney. Top out the cliff and sling a large boulder about 20ft back from the ledge for the anchor. Watch for loose blocks (40ft)Descent: Rock hop a short distance up to the Cornice Trail and either summit Mt. Jefferson or take your choice of trail down
content.location: Go into the small corner between 4th and 5th flatirons

content.description: The 5th formation from the right. Shorter and shrubbier than the first few flatirons but also less intimidating
